entry.title: $2600 // ***JUMP ON IT*** Very Spacious 3br, only 1 BLOCK to Subway! NO FEES!
entry.content:
This one of a kind offer is available leasing immediately or as of September 1st!
Situated in a newly remodeled building, literally 1 block away from the Myrtle Broadway station of the JMZ lines! The best commute into the city, only 10 Minutes to Manhattan via express J!

+great light! very large windows
+high ceilings + large bedrooms (approx. 12 x 15)
+great storage space
+eat-in kitchen w/ new appliances
+full spacious bathroom
+large walk-in closet
+individual boilers! (utilities not included)
+roof access boasting a spectacular manhattan skyline views

Available Immediately or from August 15th. By owner, NO FEES!

entry.title: $1795 // Immediate Availability- Desirable/Convenient Location
entry.content:
1BR apt. available immediately in Ridgewood, Queens

Large 1 bedroom apt. available for rent in the heart of Ridgewood, Queens. Contains new wood floors, appliances, bathrooms, kitchen, etc.

Apartment is conveniently located near subway stations, major shopping district, restaurants, theaters, banks, etc. 20 minutes from Manhattan.

For rent by OWNER. No brokers or other fees involved.

Please call Robert at show contact info + show contact info weekdays 12::00 noon to 6:00 pm. All calls and messages will be answered ASAP.

No pets please.

entry.title: $1995 // New to the Market - Immediate Availability
entry.content:
Spacious two bedroom apartments available IMMEDIATELY in Ridgewood, Queens. The apartments are located on Myrtle Avenue in Ridgewood. They are located in the center of a major shopping district, near major theaters, banks, restaurants, etc. Located 15-20 minutes from Manhattan. Major subways and buses are located near apts as well.
The apartments contain all new polished floors, appliances, etc. the apartment has an extra large living room , extra large kitchen and extra large formal dining room.

Please contact the owner between 12:00 noon to 6:00 p.m. pm to schedule an appointment to view: show contact info. + show contact info All calls and inquiries will be answered ASAP. Please leave a message if there is no one in the office.

The apartments are for rent by owner: no brokers or misc. fees involved

No pets please.
